about_the_game:
Aetheria is a mysterious island surrounded by a perpetual mist in the middle of the great sea. It is enchanted, trapping adventurers within its boundaries. Over centuries, the island remains hidden, becoming a myth in the outside world.



Recruit, train, and command a team of adventurers through lots of areas with distinct features including dark forests, forgotten crypts and more. You'll battle fantastical foes and uncover strange secrets behind the island's mysterious past. Choose your party accordingly to battle against an array of fearsome monsters in an innovative strategic combat system with deck builder mechanics.




  • Innovative turn-based combat pits you against a host of various monsters in a bunch of different locations
  • Find treasures, new spells and equipment in your journey.
  • Rest your wounded and manage your party in the Island's Settlement your Adventurers manage to build.
  • Classes and Elements to build your combos and optimize your play
  • Classic rpg, deck-building and rogue-like features, including character permadeath, procedural dungeons, and incredible replayability.

A New Deck-builder Rogue-like Experience!

The game seamlessly combines the Deck Builder and dungeon crawler genres, drawing significant inspiration from titles like Slay the Spire and Darkest Dungeon, along with other deck builder and turn-based games. It incorporates roguelike elements and offers a diverse range of Deck Combos featuring spells that complement each other. The game also features RPG elements, including classes, elements, equipment, and more.

Join our Discord!
